name: grzegorzdrozd/xhgui
description: A web based interface for viewing profile data collected by XHProf.

suggest.ext-xhprof: You need to install either xhprof or uprofiler to use XHGui.
suggest.ext-uprofiler: You need to install either xhprof or uprofiler to use XHGui.
suggest.ext-mongo: Mongo is needed to store profiler results for PHP < 7.
suggest.ext-mongodb: Mongo is needed to store profiler results for PHP > 7.
suggest.alcaeus/mongo-php-adapter: Mongo PHP Adapter is required for PHP >7 (when using ext-mongodb)
